mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE ( NOTICE_NO, MEMBER_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT ) VALUES ( SEQ_NOTICE.NEXTVAL, #{memberNo}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE.STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT NOTICE_NO, NICKNAME, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "CREATE_DATE", NOTICE.STATUS, COUNT FROM NOTICE JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO)
WHERE NOTICE.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT NOTICE_NO, NICKNAME, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "CREATE_DATE", NOTICE.STATUS, COUNT FROM NOTICE JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo}
UPDATE NOTICE SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo}
UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_TITLE = #{noticeTitle}, NOTICE_CONTENT = #{noticeContent} WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo}
mapper.select:
SELECT NOTICE_NO, NICKNAME, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "CREATE_DATE", NOTICE.STATUS, COUNT FROM NOTICE JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO)
WHERE NOTICE.STATUS = 'Y'
AND SYSDATE - NOTICE.CREATE_DATE < 8
AND SYSDATE - NOTICE.CREATE_DATE < 32
AND SYSDATE - NOTICE.CREATE_DATE < 92
AND NOTICE_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND NOTICE_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
